dcterms:creator: J.A. Meaney
Steven R. Wilson
Luis Chiruzzo
Adam Lopez
Walid Magdy
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 10,000 texts, with 6,179 texts considered humorous and the rest not. Each text is labeled with scores for humor and offensiveness, with subjective annotations from different categories of people.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2021 Task 7 Dataset
